name: Submonoid.coe_unitSphere

ð•œ : Type u_2

/-- Unit sphere in a normed division ring as a bundled `Submonoid`. -/
@[simps]
def Submonoid.unitSphere (ð•œ : Type*) [NormedDivisionRing ð•œ] : Submonoid ð•œ where
  carrier := sphere (0 : ð•œ) 1
  mul_mem' hx hy := by
    rw [mem_sphere_zero_iff_norm] at *
    simp [*]
  one_mem' := mem_sphere_zero_iff_norm.2 norm_one
